title: Meta claims US military link to online propaganda campaign
description: The campaign impersonated media outlets and activists but had "little or no engagement", Meta says.

title: China claims youth gaming addiction resolved
description: Children's access to video games has been strictly rationed in China because of addiction concerns,

title: RLSS drone trial to help sea swimmers in trouble
description: The Royal Life Saving Society is trialling the use of buoyancy-aid-deploying drones.

title: 'I wouldn't leave South Africa, I have a kid here'
description: South African software developers discuss what it means to them to do business in the country.
